ygData.subject: Re: Featured Art
ygData.msgSnippet: In a message dated 4/29/99 11:57:59 PM Eastern Daylight Time, ... Well... you can.  It depends on what god you are :)  There is a necro guild there...  well
ygData.messageBody:
In a message dated 4/29/99 11:57:59 PM Eastern Daylight Time,
shdwpanther@... writes:

> I have it as my desktop wall-paper. I agree, the artist who done this
> one is _very_ talented. =) Definatley you Necros who haven't seen it
> "should" take a look at it.
>
> Finally made it to freeport. I wish Necros could start there,
Well... you can. It depends on what god you are :) There is a necro guild
there... well hidden in a building in the slums.

> the
> surrounding area has sooo much more to offer. Zombies, instead of the
> same'ol skeletons (as well as them too), instead of having to the Karans
and
> wait forever to see and maybe lose it to another group, Giant Spiders are
> everwhere, orcs, etc. The only thing I'd have to say, is watch out for the
> Griffans. Must be hell of a low level player around those parts.
>
No... the Gods of fickle fate (OK, the designers with evil thoughts) put
griffins in the low level (5-15 level range) hunting area. Sure... why NOT
put a 34th level monster in that mix!

Sonoroud. Who vows revenge on griffins when he makes 35th or so...
